alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 7:19PM PST until January 25 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...North Central Oregon and Central Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost or ice on bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For North Central Oregon, the advisory is mainly for the higher terrain and ridges along US routes 97 and 197. Other highways not mentioned here may also be impacted over higher hilly terrain. Conditions are expected to improve by midnight as winds shift to be from the south.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
